faq.question: What is the Tax Engine app ?
faq.answer: The Tax Engine app helps you calculate taxes based on the old and new tax regimes in India.

faq.question: Is the Tax Engine accurate ?
faq.answer: The calculations are based on the latest government tax policies, but it is recommended to consult a professional for accurate tax filing.

faq.question: Does the app support deductions ?
faq.answer: You need to deduct the applicable exemptions and then use it to calculate the tax.

faq.question: Is this app free to use ?
faq.answer: Yes, the app is completely free to use for personal tax calculations.

faq.question: Can I use this app for tax filing ?
faq.answer: This app is for reference purposes only and should not be used for official tax filing. Use it as a guide to estimate your tax liability.

faq.question: Does this app store my personal or financial information ?
faq.answer: No, the app does not store any of your data. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.

faq.question: Can I use this app for business or corporate tax calculations ?
faq.answer: No, this app is designed for individual taxpayers only. Business and corporate taxes are not supported.

faq.question: Can I save my calculations for future reference ?
faq.answer: This feature is not available. However, you can manually save the results or take a screenshot for your records.

faq.question: How do I know which regime is better for me ?
faq.answer: The app provides a side-by-side comparison of tax liability under both regimes to help you choose the better option.
